title: Chemical sintering by chlorinated carbon compounds for flexible photoanodes of dye-sensitized photovoltaic cells
content:
Sustainable Energy Fuels, 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D3SE01547E, Paper
Hyeong Cheol Kang, Kicheon Yoo, Md. Mahbubur Rahman, Senthilkumar Muthu, Jun Hwan Jang, Ashok Kumar Kaliamurthy, Jae-Joon Lee
Novel binary solvent mixtures of chlorinated carbon compounds (CCs = CCl4, CHCl3, and C2Cl4) and 1-octanol are used to prepare pastes of TiO2 nanoparticles (NPs), facilitating the formation of TiO2 mesoporous films for flexible photoanodes.
To cite this article before page numbers are assigned, use the DOI form of citation above.
